on reading compounds: 卒【ソツ】low-ranking soldier, graduation, outgrowing, moving on (from), low-ranking samurai (1870-1872), death (of a noble, etc.)
卒業【ソツギョウ】graduation, completion (of a course), moving on (from), outgrowing (something), leaving (a group, company, etc.), quitting
中卒【チュウソツ】junior high school graduate, middle school graduate
kun reading compounds: 卒する【そっする】to die, to pass away
終える【おえる】to finish, to graduate
終わる【おわる】to finish, to end, to close
